snippet: A sellout crowd of 18,000 in Mitrovica witnessed the international soccer debut of Kosovo’s national team, a 0-0 tie with Haiti.
abstract: Kosovo's national soccer team ties Haiti, 0-0, before a sellout crowd in its first FIFA-approved exhibition match; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: A sellout crowd of 18,000 in Mitrovica witnessed the international soccer debut of Kosovo’s national team, a 0-0 tie with Haiti.
